channel.title: ISC on Technical Computing Goulash
channel.description: Recent content in ISC on Technical Computing Goulash

item.title: Looking back at ISC High-Performance 2015
item.description: I've always enjoyed a good road trip. There's just something fun about jumping in the car, and heading to a far off location. As they say, half of the fun is just getting to your destination.

item.title: ISC 2014: Auf Wiedersehen Leipzig
item.description: I've just returned from International Supercomputing 2014, which took place in Leipzig, Germany. As was the case in 2013, I greatly enjoyed my time at the conference, and the hospitality in Leipzig.

item.title: ISC 2013 wrapup: IBM Platform HPC and Intel Xeon Phi
item.description: This past June at ISC 2013 the IBM booth featured live demonstration of IBM Platform HPC V3.2 managing an IBM iDataplex cluster equipped with Intel Xeon Phi coprocessors.
